title: Systems Engineer (f/m) gefunden bei Fabasoft
subtitle: Linz, Oö 4020
body:
Über diese Stellenanzeige

Systems Engineer (f/m) Full time | Location: Linz You want to keep the processes of inspired customers all over Europe on track, together with a really strong team? And you only miss one thing to make it true – the right environment? Well, we have the perfect place for you! Your profile: You have experience in developing innovative solutions with new open source technologies as well as in planning, implementing and operating IT services, and you enjoy these tasks. You have demonstrated basic know-how in network technology and are serious about IT security. You have experience in Linux systems (CentOS) and virtualisation technologies (KVM) as well as know-how in monitoring, configuration management (e.g. Chef) and automation (shell scripting, Ruby, Python). You are highly familiar with standard server services (e.g. Apache, nginx, Postifx, iptables, PostgreSQL, Samba, Tomcat) and have already dealt with HA technologies (cluster). We really care for experts – and we prove it with: bright and beautiful offices, free refreshments, a common breakfast and our Barbecue Thursdays our own Academy and team events – designed for training and sometimes “just” for fun ;) real opportunities and a lot of appreciation above-average salaries (minimum of EUR 40,000 gross annual salary, depending on your experience and qualifications) Locations Fabasoft R&D GmbH Linz Honauerstrasse 4 4020 Linz Austria Contact information Mag. Harald Pfoser Send us your application now! Apply for: Systems Engineer Step 2: Upload data Allowed files: PDF or JPG; max. 200 MB Cover letter: * PDF or JPG; max. 200 MB More information Files must be less than 200 MB. Allowed file types: jpg jpeg pdf.
Job melden
